classified_components.reasoning: Door Assembly is a common feature in both ICE and EV vehicles as it serves structural purposes unrelated to powertrain.
Fender (Wheelhouse) is a structural component required for vehicle support and wheel alignment, applicable to both ICE and EV vehicles.
The bumper is a safety component that serves the same purpose in both Internal Combustion Engine (ICE) and Electric Vehicles (EV), to protect vehicle from impacts.
The hood (bonnet) is a structural component required for vehicle safety and accessibility, irrespective of the type of propulsion system - ICE or EV.
